products.title: Mushroom Matt Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution available. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces. Mushroom matt offers an unusual slant on classic monochrome slats, ideal for fashion-forward interiors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: White Grain Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Glitterbomb Perfect Fit
products.description: For anyone looking for a little sparkle on their blind, glitterbomb fits the bill with a cream-tone base colour set alive with twinkling flecks. Hard wearing aluminium slats make this perfect fit ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces, while the no-drill installation makes fitting a doddle. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Off White Sparkle Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, while the glittering glitz of off white sparkle adds a touch of femininity struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. products.title: Rich Teal Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Polished Metal Perfect Fit
products.description: With its gleaming semi-polished finish, the polished metal perfect fit has an elegant character. The darker grey tone is great for adding an industrial look to your windows and gives a super stylish and professional looking blind in your window, especially paired with the anthracite frame struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Sage Leaf Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Choose sage leaf satin for a fresh shade with a mid-gloss finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Goose Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Goose satin offers a muted grey with a subtle mid-gloss finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Chateau Blockout Mocha Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their mocha colour - a warm, rich dark toned brown perfect to complement walnut furniture or other natural wood tones in your rooms.

products.title: Cellular Blackout Concrete Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Hive Lusso Ice Perfect Fit
products.description: Hivelusso ice white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The hive lusso range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive lusso ice white perfect fit pleated blind px80201.

products.title: Como, Cherry - Roman Blind
products.description: The sweet, dotty blossoms of the como cherry have a gorgeously watercolour effect to them, only emphasised by the rich red shade that stands out against the soft charcoal grey and rich cream it sits against. The cherry would work perfectly for adding a bold, yet not overwhelming, burst of colour to an otherwise neutral or white bathroom, cloakroom, or utility room. Keep the walls light and unobtrusive, accenting with the occasional matching red and grey for added depth and character.

products.title: Como, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: When it comes to florals, the como range gets it right. And the indigo offers a deep shade of blue alongside a beautiful blue grey, resulting in a gorgeously moody canvas that combines both the classic and the contemporary. Use the indigo alongside navy blues and creams, in perhaps a main or guest bedroom, where you can complement these lovely florals with plush bedding and ornaments. Add in an accenting shade of yellow for some extra depth, vibrancy, and personality.

products.title: Forest Leaves, Tangerine - Roman Blind
products.description: With a pretty, multi-coloured palette of oranges, blues, yellows, and greys, the forest leaves in tangerine is a vivacious and lively roman blind with a life of its own. The neutral base is the perfect host for these bright colours, bringing them to life on the fabric. Add the tangerine to the kitchen, opting for white units but pale tangerine walls, which will really make a statement. Keep the multi-coloured look going throughout the rest of the room, rather than sticking to just one colour - the look will be cosy yet cheerful, and most certainly welcoming.

products.title: Indira, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The indira charcoal is a unique and eye-catching roman blind featuring an array of beautifully drawn elephants surrounded by intricate patterning. The charcoal background is the perfect canvas for the creamy grey oatmeal of the imagery, and offsets it wonderfully. Team the charcoal with other charcoal greys, the occasional navy blue, and plenty of matching cream for cosy yet moody look in a den or sitting room, where warmth and comfort always come first.

products.title: Hathaway, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: The hathaway indigo features an ornate pattern with a traditional vibe, displayed in deep navy indigo and soft cream, making for a striking and attractive roman blind. The 100% cotton fabric sits neatly in roman folds, perfectly suited for its purpose. Blend the indigo with cream walls and gold-toned soft furnishings for a look of real grandeur in your living room. Cream flooring and sofas will provide a fantastic base for gold and navy cushions, throws, and rugs, going for ultimate glamour.

products.title: Heritage, Midnight - Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the heritage in midnight features a deep royal blue base, adorned with an ornate floral and bird pattern in pretty pale pastel tones. The colours offset each other beautifully, making this roman blind a real work of art. The midnight would look beautiful in the dining room amidst dark to medium woods, plenty more regal blue hues, and gold fixtures and finishings. Accent with pastel tones to lighten the mood, resulting in a glamorous look that you and your guests can relax in and enjoy.

products.title: Heritage, Cedar - Roman Blind
products.description: On a charcoal black background sit beautifully painted florals, foliage, and birds, and this stunning work of art is the heritage in cedar. Barely there pastel blues, pinks, and greens pop from the base colour, just as they should. Create some drama in the dining room by including the cedar in your dcor scheme. Choose dark furniture and glamorous accessories, using the pastel tones in the blind to accent throughout the room, for a coordinated look that's full of depth.

products.title: Cotswold, Jade - Roman Blind
products.description: The cotswold in jade is perfectly named, with the pretty florals particularly reminiscent of gorgeous countryside. This beautiful roman blind mixes a canvas of predominantly green tones with pink-toned mauves and sunny yellows for a summery look all year round. Make the jade the star of the show in the living room, surrounding it with soft cream walls and matching shades of green and pink throughout the room.

products.title: Parchment, Wedgewood - Roman Blind
products.description: Vintage blue meets rustic red in the parchment in wedgewood, where both of these pretty hues are balanced by the ivory background and soft grey detailing. The pattern is intricate and striking, without being overwhelming. Turn your guest bedroom into a real treat for visitors by opting for this unusual colour scheme. Remember to include plenty of home comforts, like a warm duvet, plenty of blankets and throws, and of course, a scatter cushion or two - not to mention a good lamp for ambiance.

products.title: Silver Birch, Willow - Roman Blind
products.description: The abstract trees and blossoms of the silver birch range are this time coloured in mustard yellow, turquoise aqua, and soft coral tones, tempered by greys and whites in the willow offering. The hushed yet pretty hues of the willow would be well-suited to adding just a hint of colour to an otherwise white or neutral room, where the aim is to keep the space feeling light, airy, and breathable. This could work beautifully in a utility room or downstairs cloakroom where space is limited and light is needed.

products.title: Foliage, Slate Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: Beautifully understated, the foliage in slate blue places autumn images of leaves in summer colours of pale teal and soft biscuit on a creamy white background. The end result is one of light and airiness, making it a subtle addition to complement any contemporary dcor. Place the slate blue in a relaxed living room or bedroom for a serene and peaceful ambience. Surround it with similar tones of cream, teal, and biscuit, with the occasional golden tone for added depth and personality.

products.title: Parchment, Feather - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty parchment range this time offers up a delicate palette of soft blues and barely there greys, in the work of art that is the feather. The ivory white background shows off the soft hues to perfection, making it the ideal base for this floral arrangement. Tone down a blue feature wall in your living room or dining room by pitting the feather against it. Paint the remainder of the walls in ivory or off-white and use blue hues to accent throughout the rest of the room, adding the occasional grey or charcoal for balance and depth.

products.title: Cotswold, Jewel - Roman Blind
products.description: A wonderfully contemporary take on classic floral patterning, the cotswold jewel offers a stunning array of pretty blossoms and foliage in gorgeous shades of rose pink, apple green, sky blue, and lemon yellow. The indigo grey background makes these pastel tones stand out beautifully. Give the jewel pride of place in the kitchen, where using pastel shades throughout will add a prettily contemporary look.

products.title: Wildwood, Multi - Roman Blind
products.description: If it's woodland wonder you're looking for, then the wildwood multi should fit the bill. Adorned with sweet country animals, including rabbits and hedgehogs, in muted greens, blues, and mustards, this is the ideal roman blind for blending nature with fun. Try adding to a new baby's nursery, opting for matching cream walls, and accessorising with similar green, yellows, and blues, not forgetting the occasional ornament or piece of wall art in coral to bring out the sweet florals in the pattern.

products.title: Foliage, Summer - Roman Blind
products.description: The zesty tones of the foliage in summer are summery indeed, and give a refreshing and lively look and feel to this roman blind. The foliage patterning allows you to bring the outside in, so nature lovers are sure to find it appealing. Liven up a guest bedroom by setting the summer against an apple green wall, adding light wooden furniture, and accenting throughout the room with blues and yellows.

products.title: Foliage, Jewel - Roman Blind
products.description: Full of warming tones of lavender, lemon, and apple, the foliage in jewel is as pretty as they come. The neutrally toned background offsets the pretty, summery colours beautifully, whilst the leaf patterning brings the outdoors in. The romantic tones of the jewel are perfectly suited to a master or guest bedroom, where surrounding it with pink and lilac tones will offset it wonderfully. Keep the room light and airy with cream walls, but use the colours in the blind in your ornaments and lightshades.

products.title: Parchment, Fern - Roman Blind
products.description: The delicate foliage and blossom pattern of the parchment in fern is balanced out wonderfully by the strength of the burnt orange and apple green tones used to colour it. The off-white backgrounds shows off the pattern to perfection. Go for an autumnal dcor scheme in your kitchen for ultimate cosiness. Find a balance between warm orange tones and cooler green ones, and include plenty of light and medium woods for a natural look.

products.title: Foliage, Blossom - Roman Blind
products.description: The leaf imagery of the foliage in blossom brings to mind an autumnal theme, whilst the light pastel hues say nothing but summer. With a cotton fabric of a high quality, you can be sure this material will stand the test of time and hang beautifully into roman folds. Use the blossom to add some subtle colour to your hallway, landing, or downstairs cloakroom, where it will work wonderfully against neutrally toned walls, and accented with similar shades in the form of wall art, light shades, and ornaments.

products.title: Foxy, Multi - Roman Blind
products.description: Cute as can be, the foxy multi displays sweetly drawn foxes in various shades, from soft grey to muted mustard, on a pale stone background. With a soft yet sturdy cotton fabric, this roman blind takes its shape beautifully, and will certainly pass the test of time. Your little one would surely approve of these adorable characters in his or her bedroom. Consider matching the pale aqua in the blind to a similarly soft aqua wall colour, and add in greys for depth and contrast.

products.title: Odense, Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
products.description: The odense in burnt orange is a multi-coloured affair, featuring sunny shades of orange, a muted aqua, deep charcoal, and light dove grey. The ice white background provides an attractive contrast to these vibrant colours. The burnt orange would look adorable in a child's bedroom or nursery, where these fun hues could be used to bring the room to life. Surround with faded greys and hushed aqua tones, accenting with oranges throughout the room.

products.title: Odense, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: With its slightly retro feel, the odense in ochre features an ultra-fashionable yellow and grey colour combination. Mustard yellow is tempered by varying shades of grey, from dark charcoal to barely there dove, and all are displayed on a soft white background. The ochre would make the perfect addition to a home office or study, where you can surround it with plenty of whites, similar greys, and the occasional mustard yellow accent to bring out the hue in the blind.

products.title: Funchal, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: The funchal range is a great way of adding some modern artistic flair to your home. An off-white background serves as the ideal canvas for plant-life depictions that jump from the fabric, as if painted with beautiful watercolours. The duck egg adds to this a beautiful stone blue, and a full palette of natural greens and browns. Why not add the duck egg to a shaker-style kitchen to give one of the most used rooms in the house a touch of nature and a colourful lift that will be enjoyed by friends and family alike? Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width.

products.title: Cluck Cluck, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: On a bed of blue slate grey sit white chicken illustrations with lemon yellow, deep navy, and ice blue detailing, and that makes up the cluck cluck ochre. The result is clean and contemporary yet with a certain moodiness that will suit rooms that are naturally light and airy. Sit the ochre amidst palest grey walls or against a lemon yellow feature wall for a light and cheery look in your kitchen or dining area.

products.title: Bird Garden, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Surely the calmest and most tranquil of the bird garden range, the duck egg places muted aqua birds and florals on a distressed-look oatmeal base. Together, the two tones are cool and refreshing, with a vintage country vibe that you and your guests will fall in love with. Produce a pretty and relaxing home office, where you can concentrate and work with ease, by settling the duck egg amongst soft creams and matching aquas.

products.title: Cluck Cluck, Tangerine - Roman Blind
products.description: An understated choice of blind for those who love colour but not too much of it, the cluck cluck in tangerine features a stone background adorned with contemporary chicken illustrations in burnt orange, tangerine, and charcoal grey. Meld the tangerine amidst neutral walls and orange-toned ornaments and accessories or, if you need a big boost of colour in your life, hang it against a burnt orange feature wall for a dramatic effect.

products.title: Langden, Porcelain - Roman Blind
products.description: A light version of cornflower blue, the porcelain features the typical langden patterning, a paisley-inspired delight with a pretty, vintage twist. Combined with the luxury of the roman shape, this sweet pattern is sure to add softness and lightness to any room. Go for a cool yet antiqued look in your master bedroom, settling the porcelain against light walls, french-style furniture, and plush fabrics.

products.title: Birds, Multi - Roman Blind
products.description: What's cheerier than the sound of birdsong? An abundance of sweet, multi-coloured birdies to set your room alight with colour. Birds in multi is the cutest of roman blinds, featuring apple, sage, coral, and aqua tones throughout, all on a bed of pale biscuit grey with soft white flecks for added depth. The multi would look gorgeous in a brightly toned kitchen, surrounded by matching shades of green and blue.

products.title: Scandi Sprig, Tangerine - Roman Blind
products.description: Palest stone grey plays host to the main event in the scandi sprig tangerine, which features sweet sprigs of foliage in a soft yet vibrant orange and stark, icy white. Cute and characterful, this pretty roman blind is sure to liven up any room in the house. Opt for a retro colour combination of orange and grey in your kitchen, selecting shiny orange units, appliances, and utensils, and keeping the walls, the flooring, and the work surfaces to charcoal and stone grey tones.

products.title: Funchal, Summer - Roman Blind
products.description: The funchal summer is a quality woven fabric, adorned with a truly eye-catching design. The wide range of greens used to define the plant-life contrast beautifully with the subtle off-white canvas-like background. The way in which the leaves appear to have been applied like watercolours on a canvas give the funchal a unique and fashionable look. A great way of injecting a sense of summer and the outdoors into your home, the summer will work perfectly in the master bedroom.

products.title: Puffin, Driftwood - Roman Blind
products.description: The gentle background of puffin driftwood serves as the ideal canvas for the artistic puffin prints that give this ever-popular design its name. The outlines of the birds ebb and flow and the colours have that timeless airy quality that reminds you of the sea lapping at the shore. Adding a nautically inspired cushion here and canvas print there is the perfect way to make puffin driftwood the genesis of your new dcor.

products.title: Seaside, Ocean - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll just love the nautical vibe of the seaside ocean. With sea blues and stone greys galore, plus images of seaside homes and fishing boats, there's no mistaking the coastal theme going on here. These adorable illustrations are sure to be a hit in any home. As versatile as it is fun, the ocean belongs wherever you want it to - in the bathroom, in a sea-loving child's room, or in a coastal-themed living room.

products.title: Oh My Deer, Berry - Roman Blind
products.description: The cute cartoon animals of the oh my deer in berry are as fun as the blind's name. The white background is home to deer, rabbits, hedgehogs, and more, all beautifully painted in pretty shades of blue, green, and red. Perhaps your little one would enjoy the berry in their bedroom or playroom, where the sweet illustrations can capture their imagination. Match the colours in the blind throughout the rest of the room, which will give you plenty of freedom given how many hues there are here.

products.title: Oh My Deer, Colonial - Roman Blind
products.description: Give your dcor something to smile about with the playful design that we call oh my deer colonial. With a selection of woodland critters adorning the gently coloured fabric you'll be able to see something subtly different every time you run your eye over it. Matching oh my deer colonial is all about neutral canvas colours and playful patterning. Keep the walls neutral but add a woodland inspired canvas print to match your new scatter cushions and you'll be well on your way to the perfect scheme you've always dreamed about.

products.title: Linley, Larkspur - Roman Blind
products.description: Using an intricately beautiful floral foliage pattern, in pretty sky blue and soft white tones, the linley larkspur has a look and feel of toile about it, and the vintage colours only complement this aesthetic. Meld this stunning roman blind with similar blues and whites in the kitchen for a serene and tranquil ambience. Add toile patterned plates, as well as vintage finds, such as teapots and teacups, to create a pretty antique feel.

products.title: Jumbo, Elephant - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring cute elephant depictions, the jumbo elephant is fun, cute, and full of life. The children will just love it, and with simple and easy colours to pick out and use elsewhere, so will you. Add the elephant to a child's bedroom or playroom, being sure to choose brightly coloured walls, or at least a feature wall. An apple green will work beautifully as your base colour and will match all manner of children's furniture and toys.

products.title: Finch Toile, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: The cool green of the finch toile eau de nil is light and refreshing, perfect for adding a pretty touch to a light and airy space. The bird and blossom illustrations are detailed and ornate, making this blind a work of art in its own right. The eau de nil is perfect for lightening up a dark dining room or living room, and will complement darker woods and furniture beautifully. Accent with matching mint tones, as well as greys and whites throughout the room.
